title: Men of the light ships
brief_description: Dramatised documentary about life aboard a british naval light ship during wartime, describing what happens during an attack by enemy bombers. Music by Richard Addinsell.
description: Dramatised documentary about life aboard a british naval light ship during wartime, describing what happens during an attack by enemy bombers. Music by Richard Addinsell.
